name: PogoBijoux
description:
PogoBijoux is an experimental game about liminal spaces, dream exploration, anemoia, kenopsia, and loneliness I started working on it in mid-2020 and I finally finished it*.

*it's still not 100% complete and I published it early for the 32-bit Spring Cleaning Game Jam

Still in beta; glitches exist. PEOPLE COMING FROM THE 32-BIT GAME JAM: READ THIS! Disclaimer

Do not expect this game to be great, as it uses a rather outdated 3-D engine and the graphics look worse than in your average 2000s game.  This game is more of a test to see if people will like the concept, and if enough people like it, I will make a sequel with better graphics, music, and sound effects.

Minimum requirements

Operating system: Windows XP or higher / can be built for Linux. It might also work on Win 98 with KernelEx, but I don't know for sure.

Video card: 256MB VRAM; OpenGL 2.1+

RAM: 512MB

CPU: Pentium 4 or higher
